name: LizQuest
description:
Arrow keys or WASD = move
Spacebar = interact/talk/throw/ok
Shift = ATTACC
Ctrl = take out bomb (you only get 5)
Esc to pause and unpause
Press R to restart the game

It's quite unpolished but it's ok, attacc pumpkins and snacc on them to heal. Once you have the Quest Item you need to talk to Gudako while holding it. I think that's all?
